java.lang.Object
uk.ac.aber.application.interfaces.questiontypes.Question
uk.ac.aber.application.interfaces.questiontypes.FillTheBlanksQuestion
public class FillTheBlanksQuestion
extends Question

      content - the question itself
      answers - all of the correct words to be filled in
      isOnePointWorth - decides whether program counts every correct answer or all of them as one correct answer
